channel.title: Power Chopper With Anti Randoms, Multi Player, & Anti Ban. Updated
channel.description:
[CENTER][B]No Tree Left Behind[/B] [B]Power Chopper[/B] [B]By:[/B] [B]Da_Professa[/B] [B]Version 1.00 And 0.5 Both Up FOr Grabs[/B][/CENTER]
The Reason Why I left both versions up for grabs is because both work great.. 1.00 some might not like so they still got 0.5...
This Should be an amazing powerchopper. It has all details about the script in the script. I have spend lots of time making it, and it should work flawless. I am putting it here because I wan't people to use it and reply to how it works. So Plz PPL let me know any problems, etc. Also PLZ PLZ PLZ post progress reports.
It Uses a NEW way of finding if you have already chopped the tree. Now after update 0.04 I suggest you do not equip axe, because attaching head works better when axe is in first inv slot. Also this will try to chop oaks, and normal trees, therefore use ppl with high woodcutting, or power chop in a place with close to no oaks.
***Its Version 0.05 now*** & ***Its Version 1.00 now***
SneAk Peak: Version 0.6 will use a new way to check invintory if you have cut a log already, if you have then it'll go find a new tree....Also will add some more fail safes
[code]{ _________________________________________________________ |/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/No Tree Left Behind/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\ | |***************An Amazing Power Chopper***************** | |--------------------- By:------------------------------- | |->->->->->->->->->Da Professa<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-| |========== Only To Be Downloaded For Free================| |------------------- ---From:-----------------------------| |->->->->->->->->www.villu-reborn.com<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<- | |====================Version 0.04=========================| | Check For Updates AT | |http://villu-reborn.com/showthread.php?p=43425#post43425 | |_________________________________________________________| }
{\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\ INSTRUCTIONS (1) Set Up Lines From 48 to 74. The Declare Player Must be set for Anti randoms to work. (2) Drag The Cross Hair To Your Runescape Window. (3) Start script logged in or out. (4) I suggest you to have pick axe in first inv slot for attach head to work properly... I repeat First INV SLOT (5) Make Sure Axe is in first inv slot for the attach head to work properly. (6) This script tries to chop Oak as well, so make sure ur player can cut oaks, or is not in an area with oaks located near him/her (7) Once done autoing, post your progress report at the www.villu-reborn.com forum
NOTES: @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ MAKE SURE AXE IS IN FIRST INV SLOT @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ Make Sure Declare Player is set properly @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
@@@ Any Donations will be appreciated to help my player to become a member @@@@@
@@@@@@@@@@@@ Donations can be paypal money, or what ever. @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
@@@@@ It can also be Runescape money so I could buy a members telephone pin @@@@
@@@@@@@@@ If You Are Poor Like Me, A THX Would Be Appreciated @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ Next Version Will NOT DROP PICK AXE @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
@@@@@@@@@@ I know it says dropping 0 logs, but don't worry it drops anyway @@@@@
@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ YES! I came up with the tree gone method @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ }[/code]
[center][b]Place To Chop If You Are Below Lvl 15 Wood Cutting[/b][/center] Every town (varrock, falador etc.) has a place in town where there is a place with only trees. This is where you want to start if your player is under 15 wood cutting. Places I have used are the 3 trees next to arrow shop in varrock, the 3 trees next to falador bank, and the 2 trees in lumbridge castle. Note that just because there are lots of trees around, it doesn't mean it will work better. I like to chop in places with few trees, meaning less walking, resulting in tree gone mehod to work better. [br][size=1]Posted at: December 05, 2006, 02:07:27 AM[/size][hr]Progress report. Please note I am not able to auto for long periods of time so I usually auto for around 1 hour.. Here are 2 recent progress reports.
*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>* > No Tree Left Behind Power Chopper By: Da Professa Worked for 0 Hours Worked for 53 Minutes Number of Times Dropped: 4 Number Of Times Detected Tree Gone: 40 *>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>
Also another prog report with 3 different players :-
*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>* > No Tree Left Behind Power Chopper By: Da Professa Worked for 0 Hours Worked for 41 Minutes Number of Times Dropped: 3 Number Of Times Detected Tree Gone: 30 *>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*> /~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ | SRL Randoms Report | | www.villu-reborn.com | |~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~| | Logged in : 3 | ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~/
Note that one of the 3 players had only 1 wood cutting, and was cutting in lumbridge . Near the castle where the 2 trees were so it was really slow..
With version 1.00 *>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*> No Tree Left Behind Power Chopper By: Da Professa Worked for 1 Hours Worked for 16 Minutes Number of Times Dropped: 7 Number Of Times Detected Tree Gone: 43 Number Of Times Got Log Detected: 102 *>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>*>

item.dc:creator: @da_professa da_professa

@da_professa wrote:

Yeah I noticed that… Make sure you started script logged out… Also the ent detection is completely srl… So I dunno wht I could do about that… Also was it logged out when you came back, or was it logged in. If it was logged in what was it trying to do?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 12, 2006, 03:09:59 AM[/size][hr]Hmm Script needs to be started logged out… This is because when I use the procedure login, that’s when it sets the nick name of the player… I tried script logged out and sandwich lady worked fine… Here’s the report

| SRL Randoms Report |
| www.villu-reborn.com |

| Talking Random[s] : 1 |
| SandWich[es] Solved : 1 |

Worked for 0 Hours  
Worked for 33 Minutes

Number Of Times Detected Tree Gone: 3
Number Of Times Got Log Detected: 58

item.title: Power Chopper With Anti Randoms, Multi Player, & Anti Ban. Updated
item.dc:creator: @da_professa da_professa
item.description:
@da_professa wrote:

What do you mean? Do you mean in my script , or in a script you are making… It’s probably in a script you are making, so let me just give u the basics…

First you tell it to find a colour… You can do this by man different commands… You choose which command you want, whichver fits your condition… To find out the list of commands, look in either the scar help file (press F1 after opening scar) , or look in srl docs, which is in /SRL DOCS/ Srl Manual.CHM

So for example once it finds the colour it will store the location in the x, y cordinates… For example you used FindColor(x,y,thecolor,0,0,100,100)… This is the main command
FindColor(var x,y: Integer; color, xs, ys, xe, ye: Integer): Boolean;

I’ll explain the basics… var x, y… This is where it stores the cordinates of where it found the color… So in my example I used x,y… So you have to tell the script at the beginning that var x,y : Integer; So that when it gets the cordinates it knows what to do with it… The color is the color. The xs, ys , xe, ye… Are points on the screen you want to look for the color… For example you want to look in the main screen then you choose the cordinates of the main screen OR (this is where SRL comes in handy) you could just use the command FindMainColor from srl… BUT to use a command from srl you have to include srl at the beginning of your script… This is done by writing {.include /SRL/srl.SCAR} And also you have to setup srl… This is done by putting the procedure SetupSRL somewhere in the beginning of your script…

Hope I helped you,
Thx and anyone got any comments for script?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 09, 2006, 12:21:44 AM[/size][hr]UPDATED Version 1 OUT!

Read full topic

item.title: Power Chopper With Anti Randoms, Multi Player, & Anti Ban. Updated
item.dc:creator: @da_professa da_professa
item.description:
@da_professa wrote:

Well NewLine is never used, it just means that you told the computer that you will be using new line, but never used it… There is no problem with that…

For your out of range in line 80 I think I know what your problem is… See before declaring players you had to choose how many players will be playing. This error happens if you declare that you’ll be playing - for example- 2 players , but you put in three players… That’s why you get that error…

Also note that Player 0 counts as first player, player 1 counts as 2 players… So you just gotta fix that up and it’ll work good… Also Hero how did it run over night… I made version 1 but I am having trouble with it switching players… For some reason it just stays with player one and when player 1 is done it doesn’t switch to next player…Am i the only 1 having this problem?

Read full topic

Thanks I’ll try I had V300

EDIT:

This is discouraging. I may not be super awesome but this:

Line 170: [Hint] (221:43): Variable ‘NEWLINE’ never used in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\Globals.scar
SRL Compiled in 78msec.
[Runtime Error] : Out Of Range in line 80 in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\Scripts\No_Tree_Left_Behind_0[1][1].05_.scar

Is weird. “out of range in line 80” this is where i write the second player! Nothing wrong there I checked twice!

And um the first one if I downloaded SRL’s recent version why shouldn’t be NEWLINE included? Or do I have to name it by myself?

item.title: Power Chopper With Anti Randoms, Multi Player, & Anti Ban. Updated
item.dc:creator: @da_professa da_professa
item.description:
@da_professa wrote:

Hmm… if you didn’t have SRL then you would have gotten an error way before line 254, this could mean that your srl is not updated. You can get the updated version from http://villu-reborn.com/showthread.php?t=3410

See SRL is an include… An include is like already made script for procedures we use regularly… The site has instructions for download. If you still don’t understand you can pm me or post here with ur problem…

Aight Every1 Version 1.00 Has Been MAde
I’ll release it as soon as I test it…

Read full topic

Failed when compiling
Line 254: [Error] (15000:1): Unknown identifier ‘FTWait’ in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\Scripts\No_Tree_Left_Behind_0[1][1].05_.scar

item.title: Power Chopper With Anti Randoms, Multi Player, & Anti Ban. Updated
item.dc:creator: @da_professa da_professa
item.description:
@da_professa wrote:

[CENTER]No Tree Left Behind
Power Chopper
By:
Da_Professa
Version 1.00 And 0.5 Both Up FOr Grabs[/CENTER]

The Reason Why I left both versions up for grabs is because both work great… 1.00 some might not like so they still got 0.5…

This Should be an amazing powerchopper. It has all details about the script in the script. I have spend lots of time making it, and it should work flawless. I am putting it here because I wan’t people to use it and reply to how it works. So Plz PPL let me know any problems, etc. Also PLZ PLZ PLZ post progress reports.

It Uses a NEW way of finding if you have already chopped the tree. Now after update 0.04 I suggest you do not equip axe, because attaching head works better when axe is in first inv slot. Also this will try to chop oaks, and normal trees, therefore use ppl with high woodcutting, or power chop in a place with close to no oaks.

Its Version 0.05 now
&
Its Version 1.00 now

SneAk Peak: Version 0.6 will use a new way to check invintory if you have cut a log already, if you have then it’ll go find a new tree…Also will add some more fail safes

[code]{ _________________________________________________________
|////////No Tree Left Behind///////////\ |
|An Amazing Power Chopper** |
|--------------------- By:------------------------------- |
|->->->->->->->->->Da Professa<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-|
|========== Only To Be Downloaded For Free================|
|------------------- —From:-----------------------------|
|->->->->->->->->www.villu-reborn.com<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<- |
|====================Version 0.04=========================|
| Check For Updates AT |
|http://villu-reborn.com/showthread.php?p=43425#post43425 |
|_________________________________________________________| }

{\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
INSTRUCTIONS
(1) Set Up Lines From 48 to 74. The Declare Player Must be set for Anti randoms to work.
(2) Drag The Cross Hair To Your Runescape Window.
(3) Start script logged in or out.
(4) I suggest you to have pick axe in first inv slot for attach head to work properly… I repeat First INV SLOT
(5) Make Sure Axe is in first inv slot for the attach head to work properly.
(6) This script tries to chop Oak as well, so make sure ur player can cut oaks, or is not in an area with oaks located near him/her
(7) Once done autoing, post your progress report at the www.villu-reborn.com forum

                      NOTES:

@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ MAKE SURE AXE IS IN FIRST INV SLOT @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@

@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ Make Sure Declare Player is set properly @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@

@@@ Any Donations will be appreciated to help my player to become a member @@@@@

@@@@@@@@@@@@ Donations can be paypal money, or what ever. @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@

@@@@@ It can also be Runescape money so I could buy a members telephone pin @@@@

@@@@@@@@@ If You Are Poor Like Me, A THX Would Be Appreciated @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@

@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ Next Version Will NOT DROP PICK AXE @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@

@@@@@@@@@@ I know it says dropping 0 logs, but don’t worry it drops anyway @@@@@

@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ YES! I came up with the tree gone method @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ }[/code]

[center]Place To Chop If You Are Below Lvl 15 Wood Cutting[/center]
Every town (varrock, falador etc.) has a place in town where there is a place with only trees. This is where you want to start if your player is under 15 wood cutting. Places I have used are the 3 trees next to arrow shop in varrock, the 3 trees next to falador bank, and the 2 trees in lumbridge castle.
Note that just because there are lots of trees around, it doesn’t mean it will work better. I like to chop in places with few trees, meaning less walking, resulting in tree gone mehod to work better.
[br][size=1]Posted at: December 05, 2006, 02:07:27 AM[/size][hr]Progress report. Please note I am not able to auto for long periods of time so I usually auto for around 1 hour… Here are 2 recent progress reports.
